snippet: Hassan Nasrallah said in a televised address that extremists’ beheadings and massacres hurt the Prophet Muhammad more than mocking him in books, films or drawings.
abstract: Hezbollah leader Hassan Nasrallah asserts that extremists claiming to act in name of Islam do more harm to religion than any cartoon; does not specifically refer to events in Paris but says terrorism and extremists are biggest threat to Islam.
lead_paragraph: Hassan Nasrallah said in a televised address that extremists’ beheadings and massacres hurt the Prophet Muhammad more than mocking him in books, films or drawings.

headline.main: Extremists Harming Islam, Leader of Hezbollah Says
headline.print_headline: Extremists Harming Islam, Leader of Hezbollah Says
